name: effectbox
description: A collection of ready-to-use & lean frontend effects & tools

scripts.build: npm run css && npm run js
scripts.css: parcel build src/index.scss --no-minify --out-file effectbox.css && parcel build src/index.scss --out-file effectbox.min.css
scripts.js: parcel build src/index.js --no-minify --global effectBox --out-file effectbox.js && parcel build src/index.js --global effectBox --out-file effectbox.min.js

author: Benjamin Intal
